mods.name: Coracks_Adlift_Hide_Map_info
mods.author: Corack
mods.description: This modifys the Adlift Module to hide the map from insertion to reboot. Upon removal it will show player position, waypoints and dropships. Useful for making things harder or for a personal family PVP session.

mods.name: Coracks_Adlift_Increased_Ores
mods.author: Corack
mods.description: Workshop Adlift Module now works like a pickaxe attachment and gives increased ores

mods.name: Coracks_Ammo and_Repair_x100
mods.author: Corack
mods.description: This makes all workshop ammo and the repair kit give you 100 each time you purchase. My Dedicated server has issues returning stuff to space.

mods.name: Coracks_Crossbows_N_Bows
mods.author: Corack
mods.description: This adds the highlight projectile function to  all Crossbows and Bows. It also makes Crossbows slightly more powerful and makes progressions more linear

mods.name: Coracks_NonVisuals
mods.author: Corack
mods.description: My verion of 250 Slots, some Stacks, Power Improvements and medium Heat/AC Range improvements.

mods.name: Coracks_Expanded_Pouches
mods.author: Corack
mods.description: This changes the pouches to hold anything including more pouches.

mods.name: Coracks_Occasional_Weather
mods.author: Corack
mods.description: This changes all weather patterns to 4 days of mild then one day of 3 segmented generated pattern. Storms generally last 5 min approximately

mods.name: Coracks_Patcher1_Resources
mods.author: Corack
mods.description: This changes the Patcher 1 Module to 1 hit trees,Ores,Rocks and Bones. Plus Pneunonia resistance. Carry Capacity and Fishing Benefits.

mods.name: Coracks_Patcher2_Hunting
mods.author: Corack
mods.description: This changes the Patcher 2 Module to have the abilities of other available modules. Wound,Fire,Hyperthermia,Hypothermia Resistances. Highlight Animals, Movement Speed. Moount Speed. See Creatures on the map.)

mods.name: Coracks_Saddle_Improvements
mods.author: Corack
mods.description: This gives the DLC Saddles unique specs for the animal it's equipped onto. used Sarge_Basic_Saddle_Improvements as guide.

mods.name: Corack_Rideable_Bovine_Pack_Harness
mods.author: Corack
mods.description: This lets you ride the buffalow with the Bovine Pack Harness.

mods.name: Coracks_Tools
mods.author: Corack
mods.description: My version of tools modification to live a linear progression to all tools in the game at time of this writting
